A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: I can't believe what Disney and Rian Johnson have done\, they have destroyed the best movie franchise of all time in 2 1/2 hours. Even the prequels were better than this crap\, hands down. Do not waste your time and money supporting this trash.  So angry and disappointed\, I hate what these idiots have done to such a great franchise. The overrated idiot Johnson gave us all true fans a huge middle finger\, and I hope he and all the Disney execs rot in hell for destroying such a beloved\, storied franchise. So disgusted.
